channel.title: NPC dialogue help
channel.description:
I'm having trouble with the option setup for the NPC dialogue. Here is how it looks so far
Stage 1: [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage1.jpg[/img]
Stage 2: [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage2.jpg[/img]
Stage 3: [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage3.jpg[/img]
Stage 4: [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage4.jpg[/img]
Stage 5: [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage5.jpg[/img]
Stage 6 (troublesome): [IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq76/Ragescape/stage6.jpg[/img]
The options won't allow me to click them.
PS: The pictures loaded odd, I'll try to fix when I get back

item.title: NPC dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Here are the types of options I have with their action buttons;

Two line:

public void SO2(String i1, String l) { sendFrame126(i1, 2461); sendFrame126(l, 2462); sendFrame164(2459); }

Action buttons; 9157 - 9158

Three line:

public void SO3(String i1, String l, String s) { sendFrame126(i1, 2471); sendFrame126(l, 2472); sendFrame126(s, 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }

Action buttons; 9167 - 9168 - 9169

Five line:

public void SO5(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4, String s5) { sendFrame126(s1, 2494); sendFrame126(s2, 2495); sendFrame126(s3, 2496); sendFrame126(s4, 2497); sendFrame126(s5, 2498); sendFrame164(2492); }

Action buttons: 9190 - 9191 - 9192 - 9193 - 9194

Read full topic
